channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Far-Right Militias Are Back
item.description: As the US election approaches, one armed militia organized by a January 6 rioter is spreading its message across the country.

item.title: Apple releases Final Cut Pro for iPad 2 and Final Cut Camera
item.description: Apple has released Final Cut Pro for iPad 2 and Final Cut Camera, the company announced on Thursday. Both apps were previously announced during the co...

item.title: We’re Still Waiting for the Next Big Leap in AI
item.description: Anthropic’s latest Claude AI model pulls ahead of rivals from OpenAI and Google. But advances in machine intelligence have lately been more incrementa...

item.title: Poolside is raising $400M+ at a $2B valuation to build a supercharged coding co-pilot
item.description: Paris has quickly established itself as a major European center for AI startups, and now another big deal is in the works. © 2024 TechCrunch. All righ...

item.title: Honor 200 Pro Review: Midrange Mixed Bag
item.description: Honor’s quirky upper-midranger is a mostly good mixed bag, but you can do better.

item.title: Gravitics prepares a testing gauntlet for a new generation of giant spacecraft
item.description: The space industry is all abuzz about how SpaceX’s Starship, Blue Origin’s New Glenn, and other heavy-lift rockets will change just about everything. ...

item.title: How to Avoid Scams and Shoddy Wares on Amazon

item.title: Influencer shopping app LTK gets an automatic direct message tool

item.title: Acer Chromebook Plus Spin 714 Review: A Premium Chromebook
item.description: This Chromebook punches above its weight for a premium feel without the premium laptop price.

item.title: YouTube confirms crackdown on VPN users accessing cheaper Premium plans
